item.title: Be as Vulnerable as Possible to Internal Errors
item.description: Photo by Larm Rmah on Unsplash I’ve been reading ZeroMQ: Messaging For Many Applications. Even if you don’t care about ZeroMQ itself, you should read this book. It has some of the most personality that I’ve ever seen in a technical book, filled with challenging ideas presented in a humorous way. I ran across a great quote regarding error handling. > ØMQ’s error handling philosophy is a mix of fail fast and resilience.
